## OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder.FeatureOption interface

Description of a single feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface FeatureOption 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [featureAttribute](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.featureattribute.md) | [OmvFilterFeatureAttribute](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterfeatureattribute.md) | Feature attribute to match. |
|  [featureClass](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.featureclass.md) | string | Optional class to match. If specified, but does not match, the feature is ignored. |
|  [geomType](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.geomtype.md) | [OmvGeometryType](./harp-omv-datasource.omvgeometrytype.md) \| [OmvGeometryType](./harp-omv-datasource.omvgeometrytype.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| undefined | Optional geometry type to be limited to. If specified, but does not match, the feature is ignored. |
|  [layer](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.layer.md) | string | Layer name to be matched. |
|  [matchClass](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.matchclass.md) | [OmvFilterString.StringMatch](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterstring.stringmatch.md) | Match condition for <code>featureClass</code>. |
|  [matchLayer](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.matchlayer.md) | [OmvFilterString.StringMatch](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterstring.stringmatch.md) | Match condition for the layer name. |
|  [maxLevel](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.maxlevel.md) | number | Maximum tile level to match. |
|  [minLevel](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescriptionbuilder.featureoption.minlevel.md) | number | Minimum tile level to match. |
